title: B Site One Way Smoke for Defender Spawn
description: This smoke allows you to see the feet of anyone pushing through the CT door to B Site.

title: Viper's Pit For Tree + Cat
description: Here's a strong placement of Viper's ultimate at the start of the round. You can place your orb A Main and your wall for the mid arch + B Main. This ultimate is great, as it effectively shuts down Cat and has a bit of space for the A Site. Look to punish Attackers closing the door.

title: Early Round Defender Market One Way
description: A strong combination of Viper's utility that covers three major parts of Ascent. This setup allows you to play market and molly B Main if needed, or rotate through spawn to A with your wall up.

title: Default Toxic Screen For Defense
description: Place this wall during preparation phase, it acts as a smoke for both the choke points on B Main and Tree.

title: Anchor Orb + Wall For Choke
description: Here's a standard combination of Viper's utility for defense. This setup is not limited to you playing on the A Site, but make sure to communicate with your team on when to put the utility up / when it's going down.

title: B Site Hallway One Way Smoke
description: This one way smoke lets you see the feet of anyone pushing through the T side door to B site if you stand on the stairs.

title: Standard Mid Poison Cloud For Lurking
description: Here's a strong, standard lineup you can use to deny information while simultaneously setting up a lurk. This orb is very powerful since you have three different routes to pick from to lurk, and will pull a Defender or their utility to maintain the mid space.

title: B Long Post Plant Snake Bite From Garage
description: Position yourself like so, aim your crosshair in between the edges, and shoot for a fast post plant molly.

title: Top B Site Pit for Post Plant
description: A difficult, yet rewarding Viper's Pit that can be used to secure a round. This is a very situational ultimate, but when pulled off, it is extremely tough for Defenders to successfully retake. The ultimate covers any Defender trying to retake through the rope or kitchen, so make sure you look to plant top site.

title: Poison Cloud For Boiler Lineup
description: Position yourself like so, and use this lineup for any aggressive mid purposes. This orb can be used for a B Split, along with your wall at mid.

title: Mid Blue To B Snowpile Toxic Screen
description: This Toxic Screen lineup is simple and extremely useful for getting mid control, the enemy team will now always have to be aware of someone on your team lurking mid every time you put the wall up.

title: T Spawn To Top A Site Nest Snakebite
description: This Snakebite lineup is useful for safely stopping players from defusing the Spike that has been planted on the top of the nest on A Site.

title: A Belt To A Default Post Plant Snakebite
description: This Snakebite lineup is useful for stopping the enemy team from defusing the Spike in a post-plant situation when the Spike has been planted on A Default.

title: A Nest To A Site Snakebite
description: This Snakebite lineup is useful for stopping players from defusing the Spike when planted on A Site default.

title: Attacker Side Spawn To A Site Poison Cloud
description: This Poison Cloud lineup is useful for blocking the enemy player's vision in the tower on A Site.

title: Standard B Long / Yellow Setup
description: This is a standard set up you can use to contest for B Long initially, and then transition into retake if the situation is unfavorable. This wall is strong, since it allows you to play both aggressive and defensive.

title: Start Round Top 410 Pit
description: Use this strong Viper ultimate at the start of the round to halt any rushes from Attackers. The positioning shown in the video is very difficult for them to deal withâ€”high ground advantage.

title: B Kitchen To B Tube Poison Cloud One Way
description: This simple to execute Poison Cloud is useful for smoking off B Tube and also acts as a great one-way for anyone passing under B Tube from Mid Blue.

title: A Site To A Pipes One Way Poison Cloud
description: This one-way Poison Cloud lineup is simple and extremely useful for holding off players pushing in from A Nest.

title: A Screen To A Screen Toxic Screen
description: This Toxic Screen lineup is useful for blocking the enemy player's vision on A Site.

title: A Screen To A Nest Snakebite
description: This Snakebite lineup is useful for stopping players on the attacking side from pushing in too aggressively and can also prevent them from taking the A Site ult orb.

title: Mid Cannon to B Site Poison Cloud
description: This is a good poison cloud for B Site from Mid Cannon.

title: Mid Cannon to B Site Toxic Screen
description: This is a good wall for a B Site execute from Mid Cannon.

title: A Lobby to A Site Toxic Screen
description: This is a good toxic screen to cut A Site in half and allow you to plant the bomb.

title: Mid Wooden Doors to Bottom Mid Toxic Screen
description: This is a good toxic screen to create a full wall blocking Bottom Mid.

title: B Site to Top Mid Toxic Screen
description: This is a good toxic screen to block both the entrance to B Site and Top Mid.

title: Poison Cloud Lurk For Arcade
description: Use this extremely strong attack setup to allow yourself for three potential lurks, and a late execute wall for the B Site. Those three routes are shown within the video : Tower, B Site, and Spawn.

title: A Site Poison Cloud and Toxic Screen Execute For Rafters
description: Take Dish control to set up this strong A Site execute. Due note though, Rafters will be open and Defenders may look for engagements from there.

title: Canteen Poison Cloud + B Site Execute Wall
description: Use this combination of Viper's orb and wall to enable a strong execute. This utility is great for post plant as well, mixing up which piece you put up will isolate Defenders looking to retake effectively.

title: A Main / A SIte Post Plant Viper's Pit
description: This is a great post Plant Viper's Pit that can make it easier stop players from defusing the spike on A Site, either by spamming the area the spike is planted to push defenders off of the spike, or using your snake bite to stop the defuse. Remember to aim far enough to the right of the pillar holding up the upper A Site platform so that the snakebite lands close enough to the Spike to stop players from defusing.

title: B Tower / B Site Post Plant Viper's Pit
description: This is a great Viper's Pit for post plant situations as an attacker on B Site. The Viper's Pit doesn't need to be 100% accurate, but if you want to completely flood A Tower with the Viper's pit, follow the lineup closely.

title: Upper A Site Viper's Pit To Create Lower A Site One Way
description: This is a great Viper's Pit for post plant situations as an Attacker on A Site. The Viper's Pit creates a one way around lower A Site that can potentially make it much more difficult for players to take control of A Site - especially if the enemy team has already had players picked off that would be helpful to clear out under lower A Site to counter the one way.

title: B Bench To B Arcade / B Site Toxic Screen
description: Here's a simple Toxic Screen for B Arcade and B Site from B Bench. This is typically a wall that you would see toward the beginning of the round, but it can used at any point in the round if timed well.

title: A Rope To Upper A Site Post Plant
description: Here's a simple pre-emptive post plant lineup from A Rope for the default Spike Plant location in the upper A Site spike plant area.

title: A Rope To Lower A Site Post Plant
description: Here's a simple pre-emptive post plant lineup from A Rope for the default Spike Plant in the lower A Site spike plant area.

title: B Arcade To Behind B Site Boxes Snake Bite
description: Here's a simple pre-emptive post plant lineup from B Arcade for the Spike Plant location behind the boxes on B Site.

title: Aggressive Tree Poison Cloud From B Site
description: Here's an aggressive set up that threatens Arcade and Tree, as your smoke is effective and oppressive at denying information and control. You may go underground and harass Arcade players, or simply wait for the Tree players to get anxious to push through the smoke and punish them.

title: Standard Arcade Toxic Screen
description: Here's a strong standard set up for the B Site, your wall and mollies will make Attackers struggle when taking Arcade. The orb is used to isolate B Main attackers from Arcade attackers.

title: One Way Orb For A Main From Top A Site
description: Follow this video's lineup during preparation phase for a strong one way orb for A Main. This orb is only effective for Defenders playing stairs / top site.

title: B Tree Toxic Screen From B Canteen
description: Here's a great Toxic Screen for taking aggressive control of B Tree, or making it more difficult for attackers to take space in B Tree while some of your other teammates get aggressive or gather information in other areas of the map.
